Detailed Description

Connecting libserial and Kinematics.

Providing a set of funcions to use libserial with the Kinematic system model for BlueBotics ERA-5/1

Function Documentation

float kin2s_position_error ( float  pos_err[]  ) 

Returns:
the square root of the squared elements of pos_err

void kin2s_position_mode_calc_vel ( float  pos[],
float  pos_old[],
float  vel[],
float  vel_max 
)

Calculates the joint angle velocities such that all joints finish their movements simultaneously using Profile Position mode. (linear stretch) The fastest joint angle velocity is set to vel_max.

Parameters:
pos_old  (input) array with the target joint angles and the gripper opening
vel  (input) array with the current joint angles and the gripper opening
vel_max  (output) array with the velocities joint angles and the gripper opening (input) maximal joint angle velocity[deg/s]

void kin2s_position_mode_init (  ) 

Set all motors to Profile Position mode

void kin2s_position_mode_set ( float  pos[],
float  vel[] 
)

Set Target Position and Profile Velocity for using Profile Position mode Profile Velocities
array contains the 5 joint angles
theta1[rad] to theta4[rad] and theta6[rad]
and the gripper opening

Parameters:
pos  Target Positions
array contains the 5 joint angles
theta1[rad] to theta4[rad] and theta6[rad]
and the gripper opening

Set all motors to Velocity mode

void kin2s_velocity_mode_set ( float  vel[]  ) 

Set the velocity mode setting values(=demanded velocities) of all motors

Parameters:
vel  array contains the velocity values in [rad/s]

void kin2s_velocity_mode_set_zero (  ) 

Set the velocity mode setting values(=demanded velocities) of all motors to zero
